execution_plan.description: Find the gender_code(s) that are least common (have the minimum customer count).
execution_plan.query: SELECT gender_code FROM customers GROUP BY gender_code HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT MIN(gender_count) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS gender_count FROM customers GROUP BY gender_code) AS counts);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve email address, town (town_city) and county for customers whose gender_code is one of the least common values returned in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT email_address, town_city, county FROM customers WHERE gender_code IN ($step1.gender_code);
